thread.title: Apple describes its first store in Europe as “tired and outdated” as it joins the queue for a refresh
thread.title_full: Apple describes its first store in Europe as “tired and outdated” as it joins the queue for a refresh - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Apple describes its first store in Europe as “tired and outdated” as it joins the queue for a refresh
text: A planning application to refresh the design of Apple’s Regent Street store in London describes the current look as “tired and outdated” as it joins the queue to see a major redesign. This is expected to be broadly in line with the new look first seen in Brussels when it opened two weeks ago, overseen by Jony […] »
